text: Jan Jerzy Kulczyk (24 June 1950 â€“ 28 July 2015) was a Polish businessman. He was the founder and owner of Kulczyk Holding, which has its headquarters in Warsaw, and international investment house Kulczyk Investments. He was the richest man in Poland. Kulczyk died on 28 July 2015 at the age of 65 due to surgery complications in Vienna. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1950 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from surgical complications Category:Polish businesspeople
title: Jan Kulczyk
